issues.title: Elements use prohibited ARIA attributes
issues.description: Using ARIA attributes in roles where they are prohibited can mean that important information is not communicated to users of assistive technologies. [Learn more about prohibited ARIA roles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/aria-prohibited-attr).

issues.title: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark
issues.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level

Send in comments and questions to:

issues.title: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

any.message: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
